fields.description:
Noting the following 'bootstrap' properties for the following:
- Are 'not' marked as read-only 
...and...
- Do not have default values, or may not have sane default values

In an effort to make eucalyptus properties manageable. Suggesting these properties' attributes are updated,  and/or we add an additional attribute to reflect their intended usage as 'internal or system' or as 'cloud administrative'(for both administrative and/or developer purposes).  
Thanks!, 
-M

{code}
-------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------+-------+--+
|PROPERTY NAME                                                  |PROPERTY VALUE                          |DEFAULT|RO|
+---------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------+-------+--+
|bootstrap.async.future_listener_debug_limit_secs               |30                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.async.future_listener_error_limit_secs               |120                                     |       |F |
|bootstrap.async.future_listener_get_retries                    |8                                       |       |F |
|bootstrap.async.future_listener_get_timeout                    |30                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.async.future_listener_info_limit_secs                |60                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.notifications.batch_delay_seconds                    |60                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.notifications.digest                                 |false                                   |       |F |
|bootstrap.notifications.digest_frequency_hours                 |24                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.notifications.digest_only_on_errors                  |true                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.notifications.email_from                             |notification@eucalyptus                 |       |F |
|bootstrap.notifications.email_from_name                        |Eucalyptus Notifications                |       |F |
|bootstrap.notifications.include_fault_stack                    |false                                   |       |F |
|bootstrap.notifications.email.email_smtp_port                  |25                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.timer.rate                                           |10000                                   |60     |F |
|bootstrap.topology.coordinator_check_backoff_secs              |10                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.topology.local_check_backoff_secs                    |10                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.tx.concurrent_update_retries                         |10                                      |5      |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.async_internal_operations                |false                                   |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.async_operations                         |false                                   |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.async_pipeline                           |false                                   |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.channel_connect_timeout                  |500                                     |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.client_http_chunk_buffer_max             |1048576000                              |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.client_idle_timeout_secs                 |30                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.client_internal_timeout_secs             |60                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.client_pool_max_mem_per_conn             |0                                       |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.client_pool_max_threads                  |40                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.client_pool_timeout_millis               |500                                     |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.client_pool_total_mem                    |0                                       |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.clock_skew_sec                           |20                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.cluster_connect_timeout_millis           |2000                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.default_aws_sns_uri_scheme               |http                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.default_ec2_uri_scheme                   |http                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.default_euare_uri_scheme                 |http                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.default_eustore_url                      |http://emis.eucalyptus.com/             |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.default_https_enabled                    |false                                   |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.default_s3_uri_scheme                    |http                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.http_max_header_bytes                    |8192                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.http_max_initial_line_bytes              |4096                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.oob_internal_operations                  |true                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.pipeline_idle_timeout_seconds            |60                                      |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.port                                     |8773                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.replay_skew_window_sec                   |0                                       |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.server_boss_pool_max_mem_per_conn        |0                                       |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.server_boss_pool_max_threads             |128                                     |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.server_boss_pool_timeout_millis          |500                                     |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.server_boss_pool_total_mem               |0                                       |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_mem_per_conn             |0                                       |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_threads                  |128                                     |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_timeout_millis               |500                                     |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_total_mem                    |0                                       |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.statistics                               |false                                   |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.unknown_parameter_handling               |default                                 |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.use_dns_delegation                       |true                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.use_instance_dns                         |true                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.ssl.server_alias                         |eucalyptus                              |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.ssl.server_password                      |********                                |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.ssl.server_ssl_ciphers                   |RSA:DSS:ECDSA:+3DES:TLS_EMPTY_RENEGOTIAT|       |F |
|                                                               |ION_INFO_SCSV:!NULL:!EXPORT:!EXPORT1024:|       |  |
|                                                               |!MD5:!DES:!RC4                          |       |  |
|bootstrap.webservices.ssl.server_ssl_protocols                 |SSLv2Hello,TLSv1,TLSv1.1,TLSv1.2        |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.ssl.user_ssl_ciphers                     |RSA:DSS:ECDSA:+3DES:TLS_EMPTY_RENEGOTIAT|       |F |
|                                                               |ION_INFO_SCSV:!NULL:!EXPORT:!EXPORT1024:|       |  |
|                                                               |!MD5:!DES:!RC4                          |       |  |
|bootstrap.webservices.ssl.user_ssl_default_cas                 |true                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.ssl.user_ssl_enable_hostname_verification|true                                    |       |F |
|bootstrap.webservices.ssl.user_ssl_protocols                   |SSLv2Hello,TLSv1,TLSv1.1,TLSv1.2        |       |F |
+---------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------+-------+--+
{code}

comments.body:
Bootstrap configuration variable defaults are now:

{code}
#
# euctl -d bootstrap.
bootstrap.async.future_listener_debug_limit_secs = 30
bootstrap.async.future_listener_error_limit_secs = 120
bootstrap.async.future_listener_get_retries = 8
bootstrap.async.future_listener_get_timeout = 30
bootstrap.async.future_listener_info_limit_secs = 60
bootstrap.hosts.state_initialize_timeout = 120000
bootstrap.hosts.state_transfer_timeout = 10000
bootstrap.notifications.batch_delay_seconds = 60
bootstrap.notifications.digest = false
bootstrap.notifications.digest_frequency_hours = 24
bootstrap.notifications.digest_only_on_errors = true
bootstrap.notifications.email_from = notification@eucalyptus
bootstrap.notifications.email_from_name = Eucalyptus Notifications
bootstrap.notifications.email_subject_prefix = [eucalyptus-notifications]
bootstrap.notifications.email_to = 
bootstrap.notifications.include_fault_stack = false
bootstrap.notifications.email.email_smtp_host = 
bootstrap.notifications.email.email_smtp_port = 25
bootstrap.servicebus.common_thread_pool_size = 256
bootstrap.servicebus.component_thread_pool_size = 64
bootstrap.servicebus.context_message_log_whitelist = 
bootstrap.servicebus.context_timeout = 60
bootstrap.servicebus.dispatch_thread_pool_size = 256
bootstrap.servicebus.hup = 0
bootstrap.timer.rate = 10000
bootstrap.topology.coordinator_check_backoff_secs = 10
bootstrap.topology.local_check_backoff_secs = 10
bootstrap.tx.concurrent_update_retries = 10
bootstrap.webservices.async_internal_operations = false
bootstrap.webservices.async_operations = false
bootstrap.webservices.async_pipeline = false
bootstrap.webservices.channel_connect_timeout = 500
bootstrap.webservices.channel_keep_alive = true
bootstrap.webservices.channel_nodelay = true
bootstrap.webservices.channel_reuse_address = true
bootstrap.webservices.client_http_chunk_buffer_max = 1048576000
bootstrap.webservices.client_http_pool_acquire_timeout = 60000
bootstrap.webservices.client_internal_connect_timeout_millis = 3000
bootstrap.webservices.client_internal_hmac_signature_enabled = true
bootstrap.webservices.client_internal_timeout_secs = 60
bootstrap.webservices.client_message_log_whitelist = 
bootstrap.webservices.client_pool_max_threads = 32
bootstrap.webservices.clock_skew_sec = 20
bootstrap.webservices.cluster_connect_timeout_millis = 3000
bootstrap.webservices.default_aws_sns_uri_scheme = http
bootstrap.webservices.default_ec2_uri_scheme = http
bootstrap.webservices.default_euare_uri_scheme = http
bootstrap.webservices.default_eustore_url = http://emis.eucalyptus.com/
bootstrap.webservices.default_https_enabled = false
bootstrap.webservices.default_s3_uri_scheme = http
bootstrap.webservices.disabled_soap_api_components = 
bootstrap.webservices.http_max_chunk_bytes = 102400
bootstrap.webservices.http_max_header_bytes = 8192
bootstrap.webservices.http_max_initial_line_bytes = 4096
bootstrap.webservices.http_max_requests_per_connection = 100
bootstrap.webservices.http_server_header = default
bootstrap.webservices.listener_address_match = 0.0.0.0
bootstrap.webservices.log_requests = true
bootstrap.webservices.oob_internal_operations = true
bootstrap.webservices.pipeline_idle_timeout_seconds = 60
bootstrap.webservices.pipeline_max_query_request_size = 307200
bootstrap.webservices.port = 8773
bootstrap.webservices.replay_skew_window_sec = 0
bootstrap.webservices.server_boss_pool_max_mem_per_conn = 0
bootstrap.webservices.server_boss_pool_max_threads = 128
bootstrap.webservices.server_boss_pool_timeout_millis = 500
bootstrap.webservices.server_boss_pool_total_mem = 0
bootstrap.webservices.server_channel_nodelay = true
bootstrap.webservices.server_channel_reuse_address = true
bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_mem_per_conn = 0
bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_max_threads = 32
bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_timeout_millis = 500
bootstrap.webservices.server_pool_total_mem = 0
bootstrap.webservices.statistics = false
bootstrap.webservices.unknown_parameter_handling = default
bootstrap.webservices.use_dns_delegation = false
bootstrap.webservices.use_instance_dns = false
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.client_https_enabled = true
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.client_https_server_cert_verify = true
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.client_ssl_ciphers = RSA+AES:+SHA:!EXPORT:!EXPORT1025:!MD5:!ECDHE
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.client_ssl_protocols = TLSv1.2
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.server_alias = eucalyptus
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.server_password = 
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.server_ssl_ciphers = RSA:DSS:ECDSA:+3DES:TLS_EMPTY_RENEGOTIATION_INFO_SCSV:!NULL:!EXPORT:!EXPORT1024:!MD5:!DES:!RC4:!ECDHE
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.server_ssl_protocols = SSLv2Hello,TLSv1,TLSv1.1,TLSv1.2
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.user_ssl_ciphers = RSA:DSS:ECDSA:+3DES:TLS_EMPTY_RENEGOTIATION_INFO_SCSV:!NULL:!EXPORT:!EXPORT1024:!MD5:!DES:!RC4:!ECDHE
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.user_ssl_default_cas = true
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.user_ssl_enable_hostname_verification = true
bootstrap.webservices.ssl.user_ssl_protocols = SSLv2Hello,TLSv1,TLSv1.1,TLSv1.2
#
#
{code}
